section.heading: Conflicting laws and regulations repealed.
section.text: All laws or parts of laws and regulations promulgated thereunder in conflict with the provisions of this part shall be, and the same are hereby, repealed.

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Boards, commissions and committees, application of law, see § 1-321.02.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 19-171 enacted this subchapter into law.
